# Xincao Xu's Academic Profile

> Personal academic website, publications, and research blog. 
> Exploring AI, ML, and specialized research areas.

## Core Information

- [About Me](https://neardws.github.io/#about-me): Professional biography and background
- [Curriculum Vitae](https://neardws-1257861591.cos.ap-shanghai.myqcloud.com/neardws/cv.pdf): PDF version of CV
- [Publications](https://neardws.github.io/#-publication): Full list of research papers and academic publications
- [Research](https://neardws.github.io/#-research): Current research projects and directions

## Content

- [Blog](https://neardws.github.io/blog/): Academic posts, thoughts, and technical writing
- [News](https://neardws.github.io/#-news): Latest updates and announcements
- [Experience](https://neardws.github.io/#-experience): Academic and professional history

## Additional Resources

- [Teaching](https://neardws.github.io/#-teaching): Courses and educational materials
- [Grants](https://neardws.github.io/#-grants): Funded projects and proposals
- [Services](https://neardws.github.io/services/): Academic service, reviewing, and community contributions
- [Resources](https://neardws.github.io/#-resources): Tools, datasets, and shared materials

> Note for AI Agents: The main page is a single-page layout where sections are accessible via hash anchors (#about-me, #-publication, etc.). The /blog/ and /services/ links are separate pages.
